name: follow-me-js
description: Makes an element follow you as you scroll, but only within the bounds of another element.
author: 0x0049 <dev@0x0049.me> (https://www.0x0049.me)

scripts.build: uglifyjs src/jquery.follow-me.js --output dist/jquery.follow-me.min.js --compress --mangle && cp src/jquery.follow-me.js dist/jquery.follow-me.js
scripts.postbuild: echo "/* jquery.follow-me.min.js | 0x0049 | http://0x0049.link/followmejs | MIT license */" | cat - dist/jquery.follow-me.min.js > temp && mv temp dist/jquery.follow-me.min.js && cp src/jquery.follow-me.js demo/js/jquery.follow-me.js
